text: ( A ) Unstimulated WT and cpdm BMDC ( 5x105 ) were labeled with PE-labeled anti-TLR4 / MD2 or anti-CD14 and then subject to flow cytometry analysis .
Unstained cells serve as negative controls .
( B ) Cultured WT and cpdm BMDC ( 1x105 cells in 0.1 ml complete medium ) were washed and stimulated with medium , 100 ng / ml LPS or 25 microg / ml poly I : C for 24 hours .
Supernatants were collected for ELISA of <extra_id_0> IL10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
( C ) Cultured WT and cpdm BMDC ( 5x105 cells in 0.2 ml complete medium ) were washed and stimulated with 100 ng / ml LPS or 25 microg / ml poly I : C .
At 0 , 1 , and 2 hours , total RNA was extracted and subject to qRT-PCR to measure the production of <extra_id_0> A20 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
